fields.Title of Contribution (if applicable): Women CEOs negotiate higher severance pay
fields.Description/Abstract: I was interviewed about my research on gender and CEO severance agreements for Agenda.  Here is a description of Agenda: "Agenda is a trusted U.S. boardroom news service that provides public board directors the resources they need to keep adding value in their roles. Our thousands of readers bring our news and research reports to their meetings to guide their boards, and rely on our webcasts to fulfill director education requirements." (https://www.agendaweek.com/login?from=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agendaweek.com%2F)
